page.title: 10FAMILY LIFE
page.content: In Otley the majority of families have two children. Mostly mother and father both work. Only parents and their children live together. An average house has a kitchen, lounge, dining area, bathroom and three bedrooms. Most children help their parents around the house. All the families have an evening meal together and regular outings. Most children attend state schools. From the age of five until they are sixteen this is compulsory. In this area they attend first school then a middle school; after that in this area they go to Prince Henry's Grammar school which is a comprehensive.
